t: Find a Missing Item from Your Amazon Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: If an item is missing from your package, it may have shipped separately. Learn how to check if the missing item is in another package.

t: Customer Issue - Model set with missing parts?
s: You can order spare parts directly from the manufacturer. Just apologise, ask for the missing part number. Say you can order the missing part for them and state how long it will take for the replacement to arrive or direct them to how to order it themselves.

t: r/amazon on Reddit: Missing a piece from an item I ordered
Missing high value parts in an amazon order - RedFlagDeals.com Forums
s: When I opened the Amazon box (intact), I noticed that the product box was obviously not sealed and was opened. Weird. I ordered a brand new one. Went on to open the product box- well, the manuals are there, the wires are there, but there's NO earphone. Well, the most important part of the product was missing...

t: I received my order from Amazon and my item is broken or missing parts.

t: What should you do if your Amazon package is missing one of the items you ordered? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I’ve had that happen just once. What I did was contact the seller and explain I order 2 of X, and received 1 of X. They immediately apologized and said a replacement would be shipped forthwith. It was, and I received it. Now, in a sense is was my word against the order. Howeve...

t: Item missing/damaged from Amazon order? Steps to quickly contact support to get a replacement
s: October 18, 2020 - Items are missing or damaged from your Amazon order? Here are how you can contact Customer Support to get replacement items. It's very easy to contact the support and they are super fast in resolving the issues

t: Customer claimed parts missing for a return
s: We were contacted by a customer saying a part was missing from the product box. The product box comes as a kit with various parts in. These are all checked before being sent and most of the individual parts are factory sealed.

t: What to do in case of defective products – GOOD SMILE COMPANY Customer Support
s: We send out replacement and then arrange DHL or FedEx to pick-up the defective parts. (we will inform you if there is no need to return the defective parts) ... If there is a missing item in the contents of the Nendoroid series or plastic model products, we will treat it as a product defect.

t: How to Handle Missing Parts in Your Amazon Order - Expert Advice
s: First, you should reach out to Amazon's Customer Service for assistance. You can do this by visiting the Customer Service page on Amazon's website and selecting the option that best fits your issue. Then follow the prompts to get in touch with a representative who can help address the missing ...

t: Used item returned with missing parts
s: One customer returned a product and amazon removed from fba inventory because it is unable to sell.The thing is customer did not put everyting back to package, some missing parts. There is no problem in returning the product, people have the right to do so, but I cannot sell the product in ...

t: Missing Parts - We are the buyer - Can we call seller?
s: We bought a dummy door handle and received it today. All the inside parts are missing, outdoor parts are fine. So, nothing to screw the outdoor parts to. My husband called the seller? Didn’t remember where he ordered it, but company phone was there. Maybe he shouldn’t have done that.

t: Customer states missing parts on return, I received the item ...
s: I shipped a new product, Customer returned 2 days after getting it and states missing parts. When I received the item , the parts have clearly broken off and should have been there. Overall the product looks used but no way this should of happened in 2 days.

t: Missing parts.
s: Please can you send this parts: E F G H. You send the box without that! If you can not send them, I return the product. Thanks

t: Missing Item -> Amazon Order - Bogleheads.org
s: I once received an empty padded envelope from Amazon because the contents had broken out of the envelope in transit. If I recall correctly, I chose something closely related, either "missing part...

t: Items returned by Amazon with parts missing
s: Today we have received two items back from Amazon (customer returns) both items have parts missing and were not sent to the customer this way.

t: How to handle a "Missing parts or accessories" issue?
s: Hello all, I’m trying to figure out the best way to handle an issue. There is a very high likelihood our customer is trying to steal an item. They opened a return for “Missing parts or accessories” & claimed the item was not in the box. What is the best way to fight this?
